trans-unit.source: Represents the textual content of grammar elements defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: Representa o conteúdo textual dos elementos de gramática definida pelo World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificação de gramática de reconhecimento de fala (SRGS) versão 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).

trans-unit.source: The SrgsText class represents the text found within a set of SRGS element tags.
trans-unit.target: A classe SrgsText representa o texto localizado em um conjunto de marcas de elemento SRGS.

trans-unit.source: When an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object is constructed with a <xref:System.String> parameter, a SrgsText object is created with its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> property initialized to the value of that parameter.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objeto for construído com uma <xref:System.String>parâmetro, é criado um objeto SrgsText com seus <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>propriedade inicializada com o valor desse parâmetro.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A> object is then added to the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> collection on the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>objeto é adicionado para o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A>coleção no <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem>objeto.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsItem.Elements%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText> class.
trans-unit.target: Este é o construtor padrão para a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>classe.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class, specifying the text of the instance.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> classe, especificando o texto da instância.

trans-unit.source: The value used to set the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*> property on the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O valor usado para definir o <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*>propriedade o <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> instância.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText.Text*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> class instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto contido dentro de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> instância da classe.

trans-unit.source: The text contained within the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: O texto contido dentro de <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsText"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set Text to <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É feita uma tentativa de definir o texto <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
